sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a obtenu une bourse universitaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She received a university scholarship.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请在括号里填上正确的词。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zài kuòhào lǐ tián shàng zhèngquè de cí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez remplir le mot correct dans les parenthèses.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please fill in the correct word in the brackets.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 旅行给我带来很多乐趣。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǚxíng gěi wǒ dàilái hěn duō lèqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Voyager m'apporte beaucoup de plaisir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Traveling brings me a lot of fun.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il aime collectionner les maquettes d'avion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He likes collecting airplane models.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle écrit son journal tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She writes a diary every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le bateau navigue sur la mer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The ship sails on the sea.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est né à Pékin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He was born in Beijing.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon mari travaille dans une banque.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My husband works at a bank.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le train a une demi-heure de retard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The train is half an hour late.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de kǒuyǔ xūyào duō liànxí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin de pratiquer davantage mon expression orale.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to practice my spoken language more.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个计划下个月开始实施。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège jìhuà xià gè yuè kāishǐ shíshī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce plan sera mis en œuvre le mois prochain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This plan will be implemented next month.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngzuò zhōng nánmiǎn huì fàn cuòwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est inévitable de faire des erreurs au travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's inevitable to make mistakes at work.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 网络改变了我们的生活。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǎngluò gǎibiàn le wǒmen de shēnghuó.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Internet a changé notre vie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The internet has changed our lives.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 孩子们喜欢听童话故事。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants aiment écouter des contes de fées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Children like listening to fairy tales.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 公司每年组织一次体检。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī měinián zǔzhī yī cì tǐjiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise organise un examen médical chaque année.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company organizes a physical examination every year.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们应该重视环境保护。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons accorder de l'importance à la protection de l'environnement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should attach importance to environmental protection.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La mariée porte une robe de mariée blanche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The bride is wearing a white wedding dress.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ tài kùn le, xiǎng shuìjiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis trop fatigué, je veux dormir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm too sleepy, I want to sleep.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chūnjì shì bōzhǒng de hǎo shíjié.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le printemps est une bonne saison pour semer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Spring is a good season for planting.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle fait les choses de manière très méticuleuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She does things very meticulously.
